description: Update documentation to reflect the refactored AI loop, its new interface, and how to use it.
instructions: Locate or create the documentation file `docs/ai_loop.md`.
Read the contents of `docs/refactored_ai_loop_design.md` to understand the design decisions and architecture of the refactored AI loop.
Examine the code in `ai_whisperer/refactored_ai_loop.py` to identify the new public interface, key functions, and classes.
Update the `docs/ai_loop.md` file to include a clear explanation of the refactored AI loop's purpose and how it differs from the previous implementation (if applicable).
Detail the new public interface of the AI loop, including function signatures, parameters, and return values.
Provide concrete, runnable examples demonstrating how to use the standalone AI loop for various tasks or scenarios.
Explicitly mention and explain the support for interactive sessions and streaming within the refactored AI loop.
Ensure the documentation is clear, concise, and easy for users to understand.
validation_criteria: The content of `docs/ai_loop.md` has been updated or created.
The documentation accurately describes the refactored architecture of the AI loop.
The documentation clearly outlines the new public interface of the AI loop.
At least one usage example is provided in the documentation.
The documentation explicitly mentions support for interactive sessions and streaming.
The documentation is well-formatted and uses standard markdown conventions.
name: update_documentation
